Package pyxmpp :: Package jabber :: Module muccore :: Class MucStanzaExt
[hide private]

Class MucStanzaExt

source code

Known Subclasses:
  • MucIq
  • , MucPresence
Base class for MUC specific stanza extensions. Used together with one of stanza classes (Iq, Message or Presence).
